section.title: Available Documentation
section.para: The following &PRODNAME; documentation is available as of v2.4.1:

listitem.para: Getting Started: This high-level introduction provides an architectural overview and summarizes several deployment methods.
Glossary: The &PRODNAME; glossary defines key terms as they are used in the context of &PRODABBREV; documentation.

Deployment Handbooks: Deployment handbooks are non-procedural collections of key facts designed to be helpful in preparing to use &PRODNAME; or specific components of &PRODNAME;. Deployment handbooks are available to assist with:

tip.para: For the latest information about &PRODNAME;, visit the &PRODNAME; wiki at http://wiki.openrepose.org/.

In the &PRODNAME; wiki, visit Release Notes frequently for updates on new features, fixes, and known issues. If you subscribe to the &PRODNAME; Announcements list, we will email you a copy of the Release Notes for every new release.

You can ask for automatic notification by email when a wiki page changes. To set this up, open the page that interests you. At the upper right of that page, pull down the Tools menu. On the menu, click Watch.

section.para: The &PRODNAME; website at http://openrepose.org/ offers links to the full &PRODNAME; documentation set. It also offers a downloadable tutorial and links to &PRODNAME;-related blog postings.
&PRODNAME; is an open-source project. You are welcome to examine and contribute to our GitHub source repository at https://github.com/rackspace/repose/.
